§ Vlog Razor

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Vlog Razor** was a news-aggregator [[web-site]] for the [[videoblogging-mailing-list]] community, and anyone else interesting in [[vlogging]].

**Vlog Razor** was created by **Charles Iliya Krempeaux**.

Its Internet domain-name was ``vlograzor.com``
